useCase.name: User Registration
useCase.description: Allow a user to register on the platform through a web form

preconditions.precondition: User must have access to the registration process
Frontend application and Middleware service are running

useCase.trigger: User wishes to register on the platform

mainSequence.step: Frontend shows registration form to the User
User fills in the registration form
Frontend shows consent form to the User
Frontend forwards the registration data to Middleware
Frontend shows success message to the User
